Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Administration of nocistatin ( 1 . 5 and / or 5 . 0 nmol mouse - 1 , i . c . v . ) 30 min before spontaneous alternation performance or the training session of the passive avoidance task , attenuated the scopolamine - induced impairment of spontaneous alternation and passive avoidance behaviours .

| scopolamine-induced impairment |

In this paragraph, the disease is referred to as "scopolamine-induced impairment." Scopolamine is a drug that can cause impairment when administered to mice, and that impairment is the focus of the study described in the paragraph.

| scopolamine-induced impairment |
